name: Family Tennis
description: Daddy, Mommy, Sarah, and Billy return once more for some hard-hitting, fast-paced tennis action! Battle it out between the happy family members as you all vie for that top spot of tennis champion. Choose among three different modes to play: Elimination Match, Free Match, and Thrilling Rally mode! Play against the CPU or your friends to your heart's content! Elimination Match mode pits you against the CPU to test your skills against an AI opponent. Free Match mode allows you to play against another player under conditions of your choosing. Thrilling Rally mode lets you play against up to 3 other players where you rally for points to see who can get to 100 points first. Is the fire of competition raging inside you hot enough to become the victor of Family Tennis?
